text: Today as you click with Gmail and you sign into everything that is what chat Gypty is trying to become by the way they want to become the single sign on of your life so that every piece of data that you have is with them. So the show that you watched on Netflix yesterday, the Google search that you made 3 days back, the conversation that you had with your girlfriend, everything is behind the login today. Yeah, if that login is happening via charge and you allow it to get access to your information, which you will by the way because you want your results to be personalized.
